Title: Allows financial assistance to farm operations to enable them to implement subsurface tile drainage projects; repealer
Summary: Allows financial assistance to farm operations to enable them to implement subsurface tile drainage projects to treat excessive amounts of subsurface water on an otherwise viable piece of farm land.
LawSection: Soil and Water Conservation Districts Law
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง4-a, Cons Dists L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the soil and water conservation districts law, in relation to farm drain tile financial assistance; and to repeal section 4-a of such law relating thereto
